:v-model.description: The two-way bind slider selects a value

block-width.description: The width of the slider button (etc. is higher than the width), in rpx
block-width.description_zh: 滑动按钮的宽度(高等于宽)，单位rpx

height.description: Slide the height of the selection bar in rpx
height.description_zh: 滑动选择条的高度，单位rpx

inactive-color.description: Slide the bottom background color of the selection bar
inactive-color.description_zh: 滑动选择条的底部背景颜色

active-color.description: The background color of the selection section at the bottom
active-color.description_zh: 底部选择部分的背景颜色

block-style.description: Customize the style of the slider button, the object form
block-style.description_zh: 给滑块按钮自定义样式，对象形式

use-slot.description: Whether to use slot or not to pass in a custom slider
use-slot.description_zh: 是否使用slot传入自定义滑块
